mapper.select: SELECT id, task_publish_id AS taskPublishId, rule_info_id AS ruleInfoId , name, platform, module, task_type AS taskType, link, link_title AS linkTitle , content_repositories_type AS contentRepositoriesType , content_repositories_name AS contentRepositoriesName , like_content AS likeContent, execute_count AS executeCount, finish_count AS finishCount , finish_time AS finishTime, status , create_time AS createTime, update_time AS updateTime , creator, updater FROM task_info WHERE execute_count > finish_count AND task_type = #{params.taskType} AND status = #{params.status} ORDER BY update_time DESC
mapper.update: UPDATE task_info SET finish_count = finish_count + 1 WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE task_info SET status = 2, finish_time = now() WHERE id = #{id} AND execute_count = finish_count
UPDATE task_info SET status = #{status} WHERE id = #{id}
